activities:
Daegis provides a suite of litigation support and electronic discovery technical and consulting services.  Under the direction of our clients, Daegis performs forensic data collections, receives and processes electronically stored information and may also receive and convert paper documents to an electronic format.  Some of this data may contain personal information.
In this data processor role, Daegis also hosts the data on behalf of our clients for their or our access for document review related to litigation, internal or governmental investigation or similar legal matters.  
Personal information transferred to the United States may either be held in a secure storage location for preservation purposes or is processed as described above.  Daegis is ISOISO/IEC 27001:2005 Certified,Certificate Number IS 543037.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We will use the American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program for dispute resolution.
